Title: La Joconde
Description: It depicts a half-body portrait, probably of the Florentine Lisa Gherardini
Author: Léonard de Vinci

Title: Les Tournesols
Description: It depicts bouquets of sunflowers in vases
Author: Vincent van Gogh

Title: The Nightmare
Description: It shows a woman in deep sleep with her arms thrown below her, and with a demonic and ape-like incubus crouched on her chest
Author: Henry Fuseli

Title: The Scream
Description: Symbolizing the modern man swept away by a crisis of existential anguish
Author: Edvard Munch

Title: La Nuit étoilée
Description: Symbolizing the modern man swept away by a crisis of existential anguish
Author: Vincent van Gogh

Title: Les Demoiselles d'Avignon
Description: A revolutionary work that heralded Cubism, featuring distorted, angular figures in a brothel scene
Author: Pablo Picasso

Title: La Persistance de la Mémoire
Description: A surreal representation of soft watches in a desert landscape, exploring the concepts of time and reality
Author: Salvador Dalí

Title: Les Amoureux
Description: An intimate and moving depiction of a couple embracing in an idyllic landscape, symbolizing love and human connection
Author: Pierre-Auguste Renoir

Title: Abstracktes Bild
Description: With its vivid colors, this canvas inspires joie de vivre and beauty.
Author: Gerhard Richter
